text: Don't load fonts when font fields are hidden. :pray::skin-tone-2:

hey HubSpot team. Just a suggestion but on some of the dev docs, the section explaining the objects and the default properties is a little squished together.

example:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/crm-custom-objects>
most annoying, the “comments available” in posts :rage:
thats literaly the most basic thing to do for dinamic pages. i can help you to check your settings if you want. facil, 5 min.
